metadata.description: As an intergalactic force enslaves planets across the galaxy, the legendary team known only as the Sirens must reunite to save the galaxy-but is that even possible when the Sirens themselves don't even remember who they are? And the rest of the universe only remembers them as villains. A six-issue miniseries featuring your new favorite comic book team, written and drawn by the master himself, George Perez (Wonder Woman, JLA Vs. Avengers) begins his greatest story yet.
metadata.name: George Perez's Sirens
